title: NPC MOD出问题，一在服务器里生成NPC，客户端就卡退。
author: hm6724abc
txt_content:
本帖最后由 hm6724abc 于 2013-7-31 20:43 编辑 

如题，然后MC就出现这样一大段文字，表示我不懂。
求大神解决啊！

------------------------------------------------------------------分割线----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Exception in world tick
A full error report has been saved to F:\TDDOWNLOAD\客户端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-31_20.32.46-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 981d7f3a --------
Full report at:
F:\TDDOWNLOAD\客户端\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-07-31_20.32.46-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!
